statements: DELETE FROM email_segments WHERE segment_name = 'High Engagers';
DELETE FROM email_segments WHERE segment_name = 'Active Users' AND demographics_filter LIKE '%Male%';
DELETE FROM email_subscribers WHERE subscriber_id = 100 AND email_address = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM segments_demographics WHERE demographics_criteria = 'Age between 18-34';
DELETE FROM behavior_segments WHERE segment_name = 'Active Users';
DELETE FROM engagement_segments WHERE segment_name = 'Inactive Users';
DELETE FROM subscriber_demographics WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM subscriber_behaviors WHERE opens < 10 AND subscriptions >= 5;
